parts.text: {"word":"COVID-negative","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"新型コロナウイルス感染症（COVID-19）の検査で陰性であること","english_definition":"Having tested negative for COVID-19 (the disease caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus).","examples":[{"sentence":"She tested COVID-negative and was able to travel.","translation":"彼女はCOVID-19検査で陰性だったので、旅行することができた。"},{"sentence":"All employees must be COVID-negative before returning to the office.","translation":"すべての従業員はオフィスに戻る前にCOVID-19検査で陰性でなければならない。"},{"sentence":"He received a COVID-negative result after isolating for two weeks.","translation":"彼は2週間の隔離後、COVID-19陰性の結果を受け取った。"}],"collocations":["test COVID-negative","be COVID-negative","receive a COVID-negative result"],"synonyms":["negative for COVID-19","uninfected","clear of COVID-19"],"antonyms":["COVID-positive","infected","positive for COVID-19"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"新型コロナウイルス感染症（COVID-19）の検査で陰性である人","english_definition":"A person who has tested negative for COVID-19.","examples":[{"sentence":"Only COVID-negatives were allowed to attend the event.","translation":"COVID-19陰性の人だけがイベントに参加することを許可された。"},{"sentence":"The COVID-negatives were separated from the COVID-positives.","translation":"COVID-19陰性の人はCOVID-19陽性の人から分離された。"}],"collocations":["COVID-negatives only","screen for COVID-negatives"],"synonyms":["uninfected person","person testing negative"],"antonyms":["COVID-positive","infected person","person testing positive"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「COVID」は「Coronavirus Disease」の略。「negative」は「陰性」を意味する。COVID-19の検査結果が陰性であることを示すために組み合わされた。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌkoʊvɪd ˈnɛɡətɪv/","syllables":"CO-VID-NE-ga-tive"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"COVID-negatives"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「COVID-negative」は、COVID-19の検査結果が陰性であることを示すために使用される比較的新しい用語です。形容詞として、人や物が陰性であることを表し、名詞として、陰性の人を指します。パンデミック以降、医療、旅行、職場環境で広く使用されています。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ She is a COVID negative.","correct":"✓ She is COVID-negative.","note":"形容詞として使う場合は、ハイフンで繋ぐのが一般的です。"}, {"incorrect":"✗ He tested negative of COVID.","correct":"✓ He tested negative for COVID.","note":"「～の検査で陰性」は "negative for" を使います。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":[],"phrasal_verbs":[],"related_terms":["COVID-19","COVID-positive","PCR test","antigen test","quarantine","isolation","pandemic"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度 (Medium frequency) - COVID-19パンデミック以降に普及した比較的新しい用語。","priority":"★★☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**COVID-negative**」は、新型コロナウイルス感染症（COVID-19）の検査で陰性だったことを意味する言葉です。形容詞としては、「彼女はCOVID-negativeだった」のように使います。名詞としては、「COVID-negativeの人だけが入場できる」のように使います。COVID-19関連の状況でよく使われる言葉なので、意味を理解しておきましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"They require a **COVID-negative** test result for entry.","translation":"入場にはCOVID-19陰性の検査結果が必要です。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"陰性であること"},{"sentence":"Only **COVID-negatives** are allowed to travel freely.","translation":"COVID-19陰性の人だけが自由に旅行できます。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"陰性である人"}]}
